javadoc: Builds up a PRELINK Mach-O {@link Program} by parsing the Mach-O headers.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a new MachoPrelinkProgramBuilder based on the given information.

params.name: provider
params.comment: The ByteProvider that contains the Mach-O's bytes.

params.name: fileBytes
params.comment: Where the Mach-O's bytes came from.

methods.name: buildProgram
methods.comment: Builds up a PRELINK Mach-O Program.

params.name: provider
params.comment: The ByteProvider that contains the Mach-O's bytes.

params.name: fileBytes
params.comment: Where the Mach-O's bytes came from.

methods.name: fixupChainedPointers
methods.comment: Fixes up any chained pointers.  Relies on the __thread_starts section being present.

throws.comment: if there was a problem reading/writing memory.

return.comment: A list of addresses where pointer fixes were performed.

methods.name: processPointerChain
methods.comment: Fixes up any chained pointers, starting at the given address.

params.name: chainStart
params.comment: The starting of address of the pointer chain to fix.

params.name: nextOffSize
params.comment: The size of the next offset.

throws.comment: if there was a problem reading/writing memory.

return.comment: A list of addresses where pointer fixes were performed.

methods.name: fixupPointer
methods.comment: Fixes up the pointer at the given address.

params.name: pointerAddr
params.comment: The address of the pointer to fix.

params.name: pointerValue
params.comment: The value at the address of the pointer to fix.

throws.comment: if there was a problem reading/writing memory.

name: MachoPrelinkProgramBuilder
comment: Builds up a PRELINK Mach-O Program by parsing the Mach-O headers.
